library(QualtricsInR)

This document describes wrapper functions for API calls allowing to retrieve and manipulate organisation account level information such as groups, divisions and users.

**To use this call you must be a Qualtrics brand administrator.**

## Retrieve organization account information 

Gets general information about an organization (or brand). See the documentation to retrieve your organization id.

```
library(QualtricsInR)
get_organization()
```
